body_html:
Here's another use-case. I'd like to loop, reading from a dataset until that dataset is exhausted. I need to do this in the sub-graph initializing a variable in my model. AFAIK, dataset iterator signals the end by throwing an exception.
Perhaps, this can be more easily solved, if the iterator API would allow to test end-of-range?

body:
Here's another use-case. I'd like to loop, reading from a dataset until that dataset is exhausted. I need to do this in the sub-graph initializing a variable in my model. AFAIK, dataset iterator signals the end by throwing an exception. 
Perhaps, this can be more easily solved, if the iterator API would allow to test end-of-range?
